name: Pair of Candelabra
maker: Attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire, and Louis-Simon Boizot, and after a design attributed to Jean-Demosthene Dugourc
description: Pair of Candelabra; Attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire (French, 1751 - 1843, master 1772), and Louis-Simon Boizot (French, 1743 - 1809), and after a design attributed to Jean-Demosthene Dugourc (French, 1749 - 1825); Paris, France; about 1785; Gilt and patinated bronze; white and griotte marbles; 86.DF.521; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California

medium: Gilt and patinated bronze; white and griotte marbles
